name: Brain Games
description: Puzzles, riddles, and learning challenges to grow your brain!

challenges.title: Poem Master
challenges.description: Memorize a short poem and recite it to your family!
challenges.instructions: Pick a poem that's 4-8 lines long. Practice a little each day. When you're ready, perform it!

challenges.title: Game Teacher
challenges.description: Learn a new game, then teach it to someone else!
challenges.instructions:
1. Learn a card game, board game, or outdoor game
2. Practice until you know the rules well
3. Teach it to a family member or friend
4. Play it together!

challenges.title: Riddle Riddler
challenges.description: Learn 3 riddles and stump your family with them!

challenges.title: Count Master
challenges.description: Count to 100 out loud without any mistakes!

challenges.title: Puzzle Pro
challenges.description: Complete a jigsaw puzzle by yourself. At least 50 pieces!

challenges.title: Wonder Asker
challenges.description: Ask a 'why' or 'how' question about the world. Research the answer together!
challenges.instructions:
Think of something you're curious about:
- Why is the sky blue?
- How do planes fly?
- Why do we dream?

Look up the answer with a grown-up and explain what you learned!

challenges.title: Alphabet Ace
challenges.description: Say the alphabet backwards without looking!

challenges.title: Memory Champ
challenges.description: Beat a family member at a memory matching game 3 times!
